name: Beautiful brownstone in South End
neighborhood_overview: The closest landmark is Northeastern University
description:
This 1 bedroom apartment is located in South End, Boston close to Northeastern University. There is a queen bed in the bedroom and 1 twin daybed with a twin trundle in the living room which can be used as a sofa during the day and as 2 twin beds at night. Can accommodate a total of 4 guests. The queen air mattress can also accommodate 2 more guests.

The space
The whole apartment; bedroom, living room, kitchen, bathroom.

Guest access
The whole apartment.

Other things to note
It’s a very quite and safe neighborhood. Easily accessible by foot, bus or train to connect with all parts of Boston. You can walk to Copley Square in 25 minutes or take Uber 11minutes. Fenway Park is 15 minutes Uber ride. It’s 5 minutes walk to Northeastern University, 15 minutes walk to Boston Medical, 20 minutes commute to Longwood Medical Area
